trans-unit.source: Searches HTTP response text for return values for Web service clients.
trans-unit.target: 搜索 HTTP 响应文本以查找 Web 服务客户端的返回值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher> class performs pattern matching using regular expressions to find Web method return values in text encoded in the body of an HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher>类执行模式匹配正则表达式用于查找 Web 方法返回值在编码的 HTTP 响应的正文中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher> class is called by the client-side <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.TextReturnReader> class, which deserializes Web service return values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher>由客户端调用类<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.TextReturnReader>类，该类反序列化 Web 服务返回值。

trans-unit.source: Text pattern matching provides a way for Web services to retrieve HTML content without converting it to XML documents that must be bound to XML Schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: 文本模式匹配提供 Web 服务应检索 HTML 内容，而不将其转换为必须绑定到 XML 架构定义的 XML 文档的方法。

trans-unit.source: Regular expression search targets are specified in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document via `match` XML elements within `text` elements.
trans-unit.target: 在通过 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中未指定正则表达式搜索目标`match`中的 XML 元素`text`元素。

trans-unit.source: Both elements belong to the namespace http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/.

When `match` elements are specified in a WSDL document, the Wsdl.exe tool applies <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute> attributes to the corresponding Web methods in the client proxy class that is generated.
trans-unit.target: 当`match`元素指定在 WSDL 文档，Wsdl.exe 工具将应用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute>特性来生成客户端代理类中的相应 Web 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute> attribute's properties establish the search criteria for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher> instance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute>特性的属性建立的搜索判据<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher>实例。

trans-unit.source: A developer typically does not need to directly use <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher>.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员通常不需要直接使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that specifies the return type for a Web method.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，它指定 Web 方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher" /> instance based on the input type.
trans-unit.target: 根据输入类型创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher> instance's properties, such as the regular expression to make the search target, are populated based on <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute> attributes applied to fields of the return type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher>实例的属性，如正则表达式，以使搜索目标，都基于填充<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute>特性应用于字段的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: The text to search, which is the body of the HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的文本，它是 HTTP 响应的正文。

trans-unit.source: Searches a text input to deserialize an object representing a Web method return value.
trans-unit.target: 搜索文本输入以便反序列化表示 Web 方法返回值的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a Web method return value.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Web 方法返回值的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher.Match%2A> method's return value is the Web method return value deserialized from the input text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher.Match%2A>方法的返回值是的 Web 方法返回输入文本中反序列化值。
